<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 8"
    pfs="Limited"
>
[Quick Positioning](/Feats.aspx?ID=3428) <actions string="Free Action" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Pathfinder #175: Broken Tusk Moon](/Sources.aspx?ID=112) pg. 81

**Archetype** [Game Hunter](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=169)

**Prerequisites**
[Game Hunter Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=3425)

**Requirements**
You could see your hunted prey when you rolled initiative at the beginning of the encounter, and this is your first action on your first turn of the encounter.

</column>

---

You're always ready to get the jump on your target. You Step up to twice.
